recipe_name: Grilled broccoli with water chestnut dressing
author: Brian Turner
method: Bring a large pan of water to the boil.  Add the broccoli and par-boil for two to three minutes and drain. Heat a grill pan and chargrill the broccoli until nicely coloured. To make the dressing, mix together the honey, soy sauce and water chestnuts. Serve the broccoli warm, drizzled with the dressing.
ingredients: 110g/4oz purple sprouting broccoli, trimmed,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tsp honey,  4 water chestnuts, diced
